title: Generate AI meeting notes from Zoom with GPT-4, Google Docs & Slack
description:
# üìù Auto-Generate Meeting Notes & Summaries (Zoom ‚Üí Google Docs + Slack)

This workflow automatically captures Zoom meeting data when a meeting ends, generates AI-powered notes, saves them to Google Docs, and instantly posts a summary with a link in Slack.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1. **Zoom Webhook** ‚Üí Triggers on `meeting.ended` or `recording.completed`.  
2. **Normalize Data** ‚Üí Extracts meeting details (topic, host, duration, transcript).  
3. **AI Notes (GPT-4)** ‚Üí Summarizes transcript into key decisions, action items, and next steps.  
4. **Google Docs** ‚Üí Saves formatted meeting notes + transcript archive.  
5. **Slack Post** ‚Üí Shares summary + link to notes in `#team-meetings`.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps
### 1. Zoom App
- Go to Zoom Developer Console ‚Üí create App.  
- Enable event **`meeting.ended`**.  
- Paste workflow webhook URL.

### 2. Google Docs
- Connect Google OAuth in n8n.  
- Docs auto-saved in your Google Drive.

### 3. Slack
- Connect Slack OAuth.  
- Replace channel `#team-meetings`.

### 4. OpenAI
- Add your OpenAI API key.  
- Uses **GPT-4** for accurate summaries.

---

## üìä Example Output
**Slack Message:**  
# üìù Auto-Generate Meeting Notes & Summaries (Zoom ‚Üí Google Docs + Slack)

This workflow automatically captures Zoom meeting data when a meeting ends, generates AI-powered notes, saves them to Google Docs, and instantly posts a summary with a link in Slack.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1. **Zoom Webhook** ‚Üí Triggers on `meeting.ended` or `recording.completed`.  
2. **Normalize Data** ‚Üí Extracts meeting details (topic, host, duration, transcript).  
3. **AI Notes (GPT-4)** ‚Üí Summarizes transcript into key decisions, action items, and next steps.  
4. **Google Docs** ‚Üí Saves formatted meeting notes + transcript archive.  
5. **Slack Post** ‚Üí Shares summary + link to notes in `#team-meetings`.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Steps
### 1. Zoom App
- Go to Zoom Developer Console ‚Üí create App.  
- Enable event **`meeting.ended`**.  
- Paste workflow webhook URL.

### 2. Google Docs
- Connect Google OAuth in n8n.  
- Docs auto-saved in your Google Drive.

### 3. Slack
- Connect Slack OAuth.  
- Replace channel `#team-meetings`.

### 4. OpenAI
- Add your OpenAI API key.  
- Uses **GPT-4** for accurate summaries.

---

## üìä Example Output
**Slack Message:**  
üìù New Meeting Notes Available
Topic: Marketing Sync
Host: david@company.com
Duration: 45 mins
üëâ Read full notes here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/xxxx

**Google Doc:**  
- Executive Summary  
- Key Decisions  
- Action Items w/ Owners  
- Next Steps  
- Full Transcript  

---

‚ö° With this workflow, your team never scrambles for meeting notes again.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
